en.title: USA Travel Visas

hero.subtitle: Your gateway to exploring the United States

visa_types.name: Tourist Visa (B-2)
visa_types.description: For tourism, vacation, and visiting friends and family

visa_types.name: Business Visit Visa (B-1)
visa_types.description: For business meetings, conferences, and consultations

visa_types.name: Transit Visa (C-1)
visa_types.description: For immediate and continuous transit through the US

tips: Prepare strong ties documentation to your home country
Be honest and consistent during the interview
Bring all supporting documents in organized folders

tips: جهز مستندات قوية تثبت ارتباطك ببلدك
